item.title: Umahi Speaks On Accusing Obiano, Soludo Of Rigging Anambra Election
item.description: Governor Dave Umahi of Ebonyi State has denied accusing his Anambra counterpart, Willie Obiano and the governorship candidate of the All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA), Charles Soludo of rigging the election. In a statement on Monday signed by his spokesman, Nwaze Francis, the governor refuted reports linking to him to a comment that the Anambra election was marred with irregularities. Umahi, however, advised the public to disregard the fake and baseless news, adding that he never made such remarks about the Anambra gubernatorial election.

item.title: Top Rice-Producing States In Nigeria And Their Impact On Price
item.description: The price of rice, a staple food for millions in Nigeria, has experienced a significant uptick following a tripling in the price of garri, another essential dietary component. Rice is commonly sold in various quantities, including 25kg and 50kg bags, as well as in smaller measures like mudu, derica, and custard paint rubber buckets.

item.title: Resign Now Or Be Impeached
item.description: The Spiritual Director of Adoration Ministry in Enugu, Rev. Father Ejike Mbaka, has called for President Muhammadu Buhari to be impeached due to the increase in security challenges in Nigeria. The cleric in a statement noted that President Buhari has failed the country woefully, hence he should resign now. Mbaka while speaking at the Adoration Ministry in Enugu, wondered why Buhari has remained silent despite the incessant killings in the country.

item.title: Afrocandy Banned From Facebook, Launches New Site And Shares Pictures
item.description: Nigerian soft-porn star, Judith Opara Mazagwu popularly known as Afrocandy has been booted from Facebook a few weeks back after she posted explicit contents such as her nude photos. The US-based mother of two recently announced that she is back on another social platform. She says she will no longer be posting explicit contents on her Facebook page due to the restriction by Facebook administrators; “I was gone for a minute now I am  back again…I won’t be posting anymore sexy stuffs  here because of the censorship imposed on me by facebook.

item.title: Awolowo Introduced Ethnic Politics To Nigeria Ex-Minister Chidoka
item.description: The Special Adviser on Strategy and External Engagements to the National Chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party, Uche Secondus, Osita Chidoka, has disclosed that he agrees with his late father that Chief Obafemi Awolowo introduced ethnic politics into Nigeria. The former Minister of Aviation, however, stated that he admires the late Premier of Western Region even though has an unforgiving nature. Chidoka in a post on Facebook described the late Awolowo as a great disciplinarian, fine writer and a courageous man who modernised campaigning in Nigeria.

item.title: Buhari Govt Bans Flight From UK, Canada, Others
item.description: The federal government of Nigeria, effective from Tuesday, December 14, has banned flights from Canada, United Kingdom, Saudi Arabia and Argentina Minister of Aviation, Capt. Hadi Sirika, made the announcement on Sunday, December 12, in Lagos. He said the decision was made due to the destination of flights into the said countries because of the Omicron variant He said: “There is also the case of Saudi Arabia that put Nigeria on the ban list.

item.title: Where Is Julia Holcomb Today? Explaining the Steven Tyler Allegations
item.description: Where is Julia Holcomb today? She is suing Steven Tyler over decades-old allegations connected to their former relationship. Source: YouTubeAccording to reports in Rolling Stone, Steven Tyler is being sued for having a sexual relationship with a minor in 1973. Julia Holcomb, the woman at the center of the lawsuit, claims that she had a relationship with Tyler when she was 16 and he was roughly 25. Although the Aerosmith singer is not named in the lawsuit, Holcomb has spoken in the past about her relationship with Tyler, which she said lasted for roughly three years.

item.title: 'You're A Lover Of Bandits'
item.description: A former Minister of Aviation, Femi Fani-Kayode has condemned controversial Islamic cleric, Sheik Ahmad Gumi for defending bandits and criminal herdsmen. Naija News recalls Gumi had on Monday claimed that the bandit terrorists in the northern region of Nigeria are going nowhere. In a post on his Facebook page on Monday, Gumi said the military action against criminal herdsmen and bandits will not solve the security challenge, but “will only worsen the situation”.

item.title: APC Denies Suspending Rochas Okorocha
item.description: The ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) has denied suspending former Imo State Governor, Senator Rochas Okorocha for alleged “anti-party activities”. It was earlier reported that Okorocha was suspended by the National Working Committee (NWC) of the All Progressives Congress (APC) on Tuesday. According to the statement, Okorocha was suspended as a result of his involvement in “anti-party activities” and ‘flagrant public abuse’ of the person and office of President Muhammadu Buhari.

item.title: Ten Important Things To Know About Oluwatoyin Madein, Nigeria's First Female Accountant General Of T
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari on Friday approved the appointment of Oluwatoyin Sakirat Madein as the new Accountant General of the Federation. The Head of the Civil Service of the Federation. Dr. Folasade Yemi-Esan made this known in a circular on Friday 19 May 2023, in Abuja, adding that the appointment is with effect from Thursday, May 18, 2023. The statement added that Madein was appointed to fill the position as the substantive Accountant-General of the Federation following the successful conduct of a selection process to fill the existing vacancy.

item.title: Former Chief Judge, Peter Emerges APGA Presidential Candidate
item.description: Renowned Professor of Law and former Chief Judge of Anambra State, Peter Umeadi, has emerged the presidential flag bearer of the Victor Oye-led faction of All Progressive Grand Alliance,APGA.  According to reports, Umeadi clinched the presidential ticket at a special convention attended by factional party leaders and members drawn from the six geopolitical zones of the country at the Katampe-Abuja national headquarters of the party. The troubled party accredited 150 delegates, affirmed the candidacy of Umeadi by a voice vote.

item.title: Osinbajo, Tinubu Meet Behind Closed Doors (Photos)
item.description: Vice President Yemi Osinbajo and the National Leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Asiwaju Bola Tinubu on Friday held a closed-door meeting. The two leaders met at the Abuja residence of the APC National Leader. The meeting comes amidst speculations that there is a rift between the two APC stalwarts but Friday’s meeting is expected to go a long way in clearing any misconception about the relationship between the two leaders.

item.title: Rais Uhuru awatuma mawaziri wote likizo ya mapumziko
item.description: Rais Uhuru Kenyatta amewataka mawaziri wote pamoja na makatibu katika wizara kuchukua likizo ya mapumziko. Likizo hiyo ya siku 11 itaanza Jumatatu, Agosti 17 hadi Agosti 28 kulingana na taarifa kutoka Ikulu. Habari Nyingine: Makachero wawili wa DCI wasombwa na mafuriko Kericho Aidha katibu wasimamizi na katibu wa kudumu pia wametakiwa kuenda nyumbani kupumzika kwa kipindi hicho. Duru zinaarifu huenda hatua hiyo ni kumuwezesha Rais kutangaza baraza lipya la mawaziri.

item.title: Skye Bennett - Age, Family, Bio

item.title: All Chairmanship Aspirants Step Down For Buharis Anointed Candidate
item.description: All chairmanship aspirants of the All Progressives Congress (APC) have stepped down from the race. Naija News reports that the six aspirants have decided to back their co-aspirant, Senator Abdullahi Adamu, as the consensus candidate. Adamu is President Muhammadu Buhari’s preferred candidate to replace Comrade Adams Oshiomole who was sacked in 2020. The decision to step down was made known in a letter dated February 25, 2023 and addressed to the Chairman, APC Election Sub-Committee read and signed by Akume.

item.title: Ex-Minister Knocks South-East Governors Over Igbo Presidency
item.description: A former Nigerian Minister, Prof Chinedu Nebo, has berated South-East governors over their perceived silence on the Igbo presidency. Speaking at an event in Enugu, on Saturday, Nebo accused the governors of betraying the interest of the region for personal political gains. The former minister stated that the next President in 2023 should be an Igbo politician, adding that the South East has not produced the President. He, however, said South-East governors might not allow such because some of them were positioning to be vice-presidential candidates.

Antes de la Fama Fue presentada al mundo cuando su hermano obtuvo fama como miembro de One Direction.

item.title: 3,000 Prison Officers to Join Police in Intensifying Security during Easter Holiday
item.description: - The Inspector-General of Police Hillary Mutyambai said there were 33 roadblocks erected on all major roads leading into and out of the zoned area - He said all the roadblocks would be manned day and night to ensure total compliance with the cessation of movement in and out of the zoned area - The zoned area is the region that falls in Kiambu, Kajiado, Nakuru, Nairobi and Machakos counties, according to President Uhuru Kenyatta's public order

item.title: Ekiti APC To Compel Gov Fayemi To Contest 2023 Presidency
item.description: The Ekiti State chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) has stated that it will force Governor Kayode Fayemi to contest in the 2023 presidential election. Paul Omotoso, the state caretaker chairman, who was represented by Ade Ajayi, the state publicity secretary, said this during a programme organised by Olusegun Osinkolu, a chieftain of the APC, for 1,000 members of the party in Ekiti north senatorial district, on Saturday. The Ekiti State APC stated that it would no longer take a backseat in southwest politics.

item.title: November 21 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: The Scorpio's ruling planet is Pluto, but as you were born in the third Decan, or part, of the sign, the Moon's mysterious powers are yours as well. Pluto is the planet of power and is connected to your sense of transformation and determination. Comparatively, it is the Moon's power that relates to your intense sensitivity and compassion. Your unique planetary influences combine to make you more caring and self-sacrificing than most other Scorpio Decans.

Fayemi Declares Position On APC Zoning Presidential Ticket
item.description: Ekiti State Governor, Kayode Fayemi, has rejected the idea of zoning the 2023 presidential ticket of the All Progressives Congress (APC) to a particular region. Naija News reports that there have been calls on the APC and the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) to zone their presidential ticket to the South, with some individuals asking the major political parties to micro-zone it to the South-east. But in an interview with Channles Television’s Sunday Politics, Fayemi said he understands why those from a particular zone who feel marginalized are clamoring for the presidency.

item.title: Nnamdi Kanu's Trial Suffers Another Setback
item.description: Contrary to reports on various news platform that the director of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu, will be arraigned in court today, December 29, checks by Legit.ng have shown that the reverse is the case. On Wednesday, December 23, a Federal High Court presided by Justice Ahmed Mohammed remitted the case file of the federal republic of Nigeria versus Nnamdi Kanu to the chief judge of the court.

item.title: Manchester United Have New Front-Of-Shirt Sponsor
item.description: From the 2024-2025 season, a semiconductor company Qualcomm Snapdragon will be the main front-of-shirt sponsor of Manchester United. After the ongoing 2023-2024 season, TeamViewer will no longer occupy Manchester United’s front-of-shirt. That will be replaced by the Snapdragon logo on their home, away, and third shirts. Naija News gathered that the contract is applicable for both the male and female divisions of the club. Also, all the age group teams are included in the deal.

item.title: Tob Cohen's Family Files Application Seeking to Remove DPP Haji from Office over Bias

item.title: The Missing Ugandan Weightlifter Found "Safe And Sound"

This 20-year-old athlete had disappeared from the Izumisano hotel, near Osaka (west) where he was staying with his group, the authorities of this municipality which hosts their base camp had announced.

item.title: Musalia Mudavadi amkemea Francis Atwoli kwa kuingilia uchaguzi wa Kibra
item.description: - Mudavadi amemkshifu Atwoli kwa kueneza siasa huku wafanyakazi wakisalia kwa mazingira duni -Wiki iliyopita, Atwoli alitabiri kuwa mgombea wa ODM Imran Okoth ndiye atashinda uchaguzi huo mdogo wa Kibra saa nne asubuhi -Mudavadi amewaomba wakazi wa Kibra kumpigia kura mgombeaji wa ANC Owalo ili kuwaibisha Ruto, Raila na Atwoli - Mnamo Jumapili, Oktoba 27, msafara wa Mudavadi ulishambuliwa kwa mawe huku akiongoza kampeni ya Owalo Kiongozi wa Chama cha Amani National Congress (ANC) Musalia Mudavadi, amemuomba Francis Atwoli kujibandua katika nyanja ya siasa na kuzingatia maslahi ya wafanyakazi.

item.title: OR3O - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American YouTube Star who is well known for her music-oriented videos and remix videos. She often combines her own original music with Japanese animation. Before Fame She first joined YouTube in November 2013. Trivia She has earned over 341 million views across her YouTube Channel. She has a dog named Ramen. Her instrumentals and live-music performances are among her most popular videos on YouTube. She is known to post selfies on her or3o_xd Instagram account, which has built an audience of over 30,000 fans.

item.title: Pastor tries to walk on water, ends up drowning
item.description: Some of the miracles of Jesus in the Bible ought to come with a disclaimer - “Don’t try this at home.” A 35-year-old pastor in Gabon, Franck Kabele, has died while trying to take after Jesus in the Bible. Reports claim that Kabele told his congregation that he was capable of reenacting the same miracles of Jesus Christ in the Bible. He decided to make it clear through way of demonstration on Gabon’s beach in the capital city of Libreville.

item.title: Richard Gere - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Leading man who starred in classics such as Pretty Woman and Chicago. His other major films include Runaway Bride, Primal Fear, First Knight, and The Jackal. In 2019, he had his first major TV role in MotherFatherSon. Before Fame He earned a scholarship to the University of Massachusetts for gymnastics. He earned a supporting role in Looking for Mr. Goodbar in the 1970s. Trivia He became a sex symbol as a result of his role in American Gigolo in the 1980s.

item.title: Senator Saraki Snobs APC Leadership Meeting
item.description: An attempt to broker peace among the contenders for the Senate presidency by the leadership of the All Progressives Congress suffered a setback as Senator Bukola Saraki boycotted the meeting. Sahara Reporter reports that Senator Saraki, boycotted the meeting stating he could not attend a meeting summoned by a ‘mere commissioner’, Professor Yemi Osinbajo, who was once the commissioner of justice in Lagos State. item.title: Vlahovic Takes Ronaldos Shirt At Juventus
item.description: Former Fiorentina striker, Dusan Vlahovic has expressed joy after completing a deal worth €80m to Serie A side, Juventus. Vlahovic celebrated his dream move to Juventus as he marked his 22nd birthday on Friday. The Serbian who signed a five and a half year contract with Juventus will earn €7m annually. English premier league side, Arsenal and Manchester City also showed interest in Vlahovic who has scored 20 goals in just 24 appearances this season.

item.title: Who Is Lil Uzi Vert's Ex-Girlfriend? Fans Have Some Questions
item.description: Who is Lil Uzi Vert's ex-girlfriend? After going blow for blow on social media with JT — Uzi's current beau — fans want to know all about Brittany Byrd. The girls are fighting! Fans that make it a point to keep up with Hollywood relationships are probably aware that City Girls rapper JT and her beau Lil Uzi Vert are going strong. Despite their back and forth drama on social media a few months ago, the two seem very much in love and frequently post adorable photos of one another on the app.

item.title: Woman Reveals How She Landed High-Paying Healthcare Jobs
item.description: Healthcare Professional Says She Makes “$3,200 a Week” in High-Paying JobBy Elizabeth RandolphPublished Aug. 29 2023, 11:35 a.m. ET Source: TikTok/@heynishaaAs inflation continues to be a global problem, the cost of living is only going to increase. So, it’s understandable that when many people think about their next career move, the thought process has less to do with “what do I want to be when I grow up,” and more along the lines of “what career choice will fund my monthly bills?
